turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order some pizza from Bella Luna. I would like to order three pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok how many pizza would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all three pizzas to be large, three large pizzas. I want a regular pepperoni in cheese, a meat lover's with extra sausage, and.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and a Hawaiian pizza with extra pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me get that down for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 large pizza, 1 pepperoni with extra cheese, 1 meat lover with extra sausage and 1 hawaiian is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I would also like all three of them to come with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so all 3 large pizzas will have thick crust is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sorry. Can you please repeat that again? Yes, that's right. Can you repeat my order, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, so all 3 large pizzas will have thick crust is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course one second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 large pizza, 1 pepperoni with extra cheese, 1 meat lover with extra sausage and 1 hawaiian all with thick crust is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Hawaiian I want extra pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. Can you please repeat the order for me, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hawaiian with extra pineapple is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course one second.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so thats 3 large pizza, 1 pepperoni with extra cheese, 1 meat lover with extra sausage and 1 hawaiian with extra pineapple all with thick crust is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will you charge my credit card and Okay, that's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok the total would be $80 dollars that includes tax and ordering fee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes so thats 30 min for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: pizzas are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great. Will you send my credit card? Did you send my receipt over by email or text?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that would be good. That would be all, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes it will come via email. would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you.
